'''''Dune Guide''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Blessed Hamada]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to follow 16 [[Seelie]] in [[Gavireh Lajavard]] and [[Realm of Farakhkert]] in the [[Girdle of the Sands]].
